channel.title: Does anyone have the VMFs for the Xen levels?
channel.description:
Not sure if this is the right place to post this, but I'm not sure where else to ask. I'm trying to make a mod and I need the VMFs for every level of the game. I have the earthbound levels (someone had them up for download), but I can't find the Xen ones. I would decompile them myself but I haven't been able to get BSPSource working for some reason (will try fighting with it more later if I have to), and I even tried rolling back to the public beta version to get the VMFs but I can't seem to find them.
Like I said, someone had put up the earthbound levels files in a repository online, so I was wondering if anyone might know where I could get the ones for the Xen levels. Whether that's a direct download of the VMFs, or tips on how to find the files, I don't care.
